get.description: Get a complex type that has a ref to a complex type with no XML node

put.description: Puts a complex type that has a ref to a complex type with no XML node

put.description: Puts a complex type that has a ref to a complex type with XML node

200.description: The XML document with multiple wrapped lists

put.description: Put an XML document with multiple wrapped lists

put.description: Puts a list as the root element.

put.description: Puts a list with a single item.

put.description: Puts an empty list as the root element.

get.description: Gets an XML document with an empty child element.

put.description: Puts a value with an empty child element.

get.description: Lists containers in a storage account.
Gets storage ACLs for a container.

get.description: Lists blobs in a storage container.

expiration.description: The time at which you should reconsider eating this banana

Banana-expiration.description: The time at which you should reconsider eating this banana

CorsRule.description: CORS is an HTTP feature that enables a web application running under one domain to access resources in another domain. Web browsers implement a security restriction known as same-origin policy that prevents a web page from calling APIs in a different domain; CORS provides a secure way to allow one domain (the origin domain) to call APIs in another domain

AllowedOrigins.description: The origin domains that are permitted to make a request against the storage service via CORS. The origin domain is the domain from which the request originates. Note that the origin must be an exact case-sensitive match with the origin that the user age sends to the service. You can also use the wildcard character '*' to allow all origin domains to make requests via CORS.

AllowedMethods.description: The methods (HTTP request verbs) that the origin domain may use for a CORS request. (comma separated)

AllowedHeaders.description: the request headers that the origin domain may specify on the CORS request.

ExposedHeaders.description: The response headers that may be sent in the response to the CORS request and exposed by the browser to the request issuer

MaxAgeInSeconds.description: The maximum amount time that a browser should cache the preflight OPTIONS request.

CorsRule-AllowedOrigins.description: The origin domains that are permitted to make a request against the storage service via CORS. The origin domain is the domain from which the request originates. Note that the origin must be an exact case-sensitive match with the origin that the user age sends to the service. You can also use the wildcard character '*' to allow all origin domains to make requests via CORS.

CorsRule-AllowedMethods.description: The methods (HTTP request verbs) that the origin domain may use for a CORS request. (comma separated)

CorsRule-AllowedHeaders.description: the request headers that the origin domain may specify on the CORS request.

CorsRule-ExposedHeaders.description: The response headers that may be sent in the response to the CORS request and exposed by the browser to the request issuer

Version.description: The version of Storage Analytics to configure.

Delete.description: Indicates whether all delete requests should be logged.

Read.description: Indicates whether all read requests should be logged.

Write.description: Indicates whether all write requests should be logged.

Logging-Version.description: The version of Storage Analytics to configure.

Version.description: The version of Storage Analytics to configure.

Enabled.description: Indicates whether metrics are enabled for the Blob service.

IncludeAPIs.description: Indicates whether metrics should generate summary statistics for called API operations.

Metrics-Version.description: The version of Storage Analytics to configure.

Start.description: the date-time the policy is active

Permission.description: the permissions for the acl policy

AccessPolicy-Start.description: the date-time the policy is active

AccessPolicy-Permission.description: the permissions for the acl policy

Enabled.description: Indicates whether a retention policy is enabled for the storage service

Days.description: Indicates the number of days that metrics or logging or soft-deleted data should be retained. All data older than this value will be deleted

HourMetrics.description: A summary of request statistics grouped by API in hourly aggregates for blobs

MinuteMetrics.description: a summary of request statistics grouped by API in minute aggregates for blobs

DefaultServiceVersion.description: The default version to use for requests to the Blob service if an incoming request's version is not specified. Possible values include version 2008-10-27 and all more recent versions

DeleteRetentionPolicy.description: The Delete Retention Policy for the service

StorageServiceProperties-DefaultServiceV.description: The default version to use for requests to the Blob service if an incoming request's version is not specified. Possible values include version 2008-10-27 and all more recent versions

ComplexTypeNoMeta.description: I am a complex type with no XML node

ComplexTypeWithMeta.description: I am a complex type with XML node

RootWithRefAndNoMeta.description: I am root, and I ref a model with no meta

RootWithRefAndMeta.description: I am root, and I ref a model WITH meta
